text: wadhkur qisat sahib alhwt, wahu yunis bin matta ealayh alslam, 'ursilah allah 'iilaa qawmih fdeahm falam ywmnu, ftweeadhm bialeadhab falam ynybu, walam ysbr ealayhim kama 'amrih allh, wakharaj min baynihim ghadbana elyhm, dayqana sadrah besyanhm, wazana 'ana allah ln ydyiq ealayh wywakhdhh bhdhh almkhalft, fabtlah allah bshdt aldyq walhbs, waltqmh alhut fi albhr, fnada rabih fi zulumat allayl walbahr wbtn alhut taybana metrfana bzlmh; ltrkh alsabr ealaa qwmh, qayla: la 'ilh 'iilaa 'ant sbhank, 'iiniy kunt min alzalmyn
